data.value: WARNING: Script-based mod installation carries security risks. Only install mods from trusted sources.

data.name: NetworkCheckFailedDescription
data.value: May not be able to download mods and translation files normally. You can:

data.name: ClickRetryToRetry
data.value: • Click Retry Check to retry network connection

data.name: ClickViewSolutions
data.value: • Click View Solutions to see network troubleshooting guide

data.name: ClickShowLogForDetails
data.value: • Click Show Log to view detailed detection process

data.name: MelonLoaderNotInstalledNote
data.value: MelonLoader is not installed, will proceed to installation step.

data.name: MelonLoaderInstalledButMissingDirs
data.value: MelonLoader is installed but missing key directories. Please run the game at least once to the main menu and exit to generate required files.

data.value: Installation successful! Now need to run the game once to complete all settings.

data.name: WelcomeDescription
data.value: This wizard will help you set up the mod manager for GHPC (Gunner, HEAT, PC!).

data.name: GameDirectoryNotSetOrNotFound
data.value: Game directory is not set or not found. Please configure the game path in Settings.

data.name: BackupModsRecommendation
data.value: If you already have mods installed, we recommend backing up your MODS folder before using this manager. This will ensure you don't lose any manually installed modifications.
